subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jia Perkins scored 19 points to lead the Chicago Sky to a 69-60 win over the Liberty on Thursday night, the teams’ first W.N.B.A. game after a monthlong Olympic break.
snippet: Jia Perkins scored 19 points to lead the Chicago Sky to a 69-60 win over the Liberty on Thursday night, the teams’ first W.N.B.A. game after a monthlong Olympic break.
